document.full_text: manny ramirez, a 12-times all-star who won two world series titles with the boston red sox, has retired after being notified of a drug-policy issue, major league baseball said on friday.
document.title: rays' ramirez retires after drug-policy issue
lines_and_colors: manny ramirez, a 12-times all-star who won two world series titles with the boston red sox, has retired after being notified of a drug-policy issue, major league baseball said on friday.
